name: Boss From Hell
description:
A small decision making card game made for Jame-gam#26 Inspired by Reigns.
I'm not very satisfied with how the game turned out, but learned a lot while making it. and at least I was able to deliver something for the jam!
There are not very many cards in the game at this point, but if there was more time in the jam making more cards and more interesting events, as well as some other resources to manage could be fun.

How to play:

Use your mouse to swipe cards left or right to make decisions. Try to keep the company running without losing all money or employees for as long as possible.

Art by: Alexandre Rodier, AKA 'deadgoblin'
